incremental.translation[0].definitions[0: increasing in amount or value gradually and by a regular amount
incremental.translation[0].definitions[1: Mr Kennedy said that progress on reforms would be incremental.
incremental.translation[1].definitions[0: an incremental process is one where things happen in small steps
Kaizen, a Japanese concept of incremental improvements in products through team efforts
incremental.translation[1].definitions[1: an incremental amount, sum etc is small when considered by itself
The cuts are incremental (2% to 3%), not radical, but they add up.
